yaml.title: The Harms of Historical Hyperbole.
yaml.author: **Dylan Spicker**
yaml.description: Talk given at the [Statistics and Actuarial Sciences Student Seminar Series (SASSSS)](https://web.archive.org/web/20210629212849/https://uwaterloo.ca/statistics-and-actuarial-science/events/department-seminar-dylan-spicker). (2021, Waterloo). ([PDF of Slides](/pdf/Dylan%20Spicker%20-%20SASSSS%20-%202021.pdf). Note, these slides were originally presented as an interactive presentation, rather than PDF, so some is lost in translation. I am working on figuring out how to display the presentation here better! Apologies.)
